COMMAND.NAME: Load small
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Loads a mini dataset. It contains about 100 entities only.

COMMAND.NAME: Load medium
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Loads a medium size dataset. The supply chain is 5 levels deep, contains 5000 buffers and 10000 demands.

COMMAND.NAME: Load large
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Loads a large dataset. The supply chain is 10 levels deep, contains 100000 buffers and 100000 demands.

COMMAND.NAME: Clean model
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Removes the complete model from memory.
